attributes.action: Prevent the UK government from reneging on the Withdrawal Agreement from the EU
attributes.additional_details: allowing this to happen moves this country to a more dictatorship state without allowing a fully democratic process to be taken. Changes to any part of law needs full scrutiny by all MPs allowong for a proper review to ensure that this change is in all interests of the United Kingdom
attributes.background: the UK Government is proposing to change the law in relation to the EU withdrawal agreement without further scrutiny by Parliament of the House of Lords. This cannot be allowed as these are the terms that the British people voted for in the UK General election

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550558
